project.description: Build Elexis Core (at.medevit.medelexis.core.feature) and create artifacts for platforms.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "=== Beziehe Abh√§ngigkeiten" mkdir tmp hg clone -u Release_2.1.1 /srv/www/repo.medelexis.ch-SSL/medelexis-trunk ./tmp cp -r ./tmp/* . rm -r ./tmp
echo "=== Fix component dirname/buildname mismatch" /usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh elexis ch.elexis /usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh elexis-utilities ch.rgw.utility /usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh h2-adapter ch.elexis.h2.connector /usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh hsql-adapter ch.elexis.hsql.connector /usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh mysql-adapter ch.elexis.mysql.connector /usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh postgresql-adapter ch.elexis.postgresql.connector
/usr/local/bin/renameEclipseProject.sh elexis-importer ch.elexis.importer.div

hudson.plugins.buckminster.EclipseBuckmi.commands: import '${WORKSPACE}/at.medevit.medelexis.releng/buckminster/local.core.cquery' build -c perform -D target.os=linux -D target.ws=gtk -D target.arch=x86_64 at.medevit.medelexis.core.feature#create.product.zip perform -D target.os=linux -D target.ws=gtk -D target.arch=x86 at.medevit.medelexis.core.feature#create.product.zip perform -D encoding=UTF-8 -D target.os=macosx -D target.ws=cocoa -D target.arch=x86_64 at.medevit.medelexis.core.feature#create.product.zip perform -D target.os=win32 -D target.ws=win32 -D target.arch=x86 at.medevit.medelexis.core.feature#create.product.zip
